'''''Amon Hen'' 101''' is the one-hundred-and-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[1990]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Crown of the Troll King''
** By: Simon Jacobs
* Editorial
** By: Tony Curtis
* Contents
* Announcements
* Reviews
** By: various contributors
* Psychiatry in [[Middle-earth|Middle Earth]]
** By: Sigismond Fried
* ...a further instalment!
** By: Salman Rushtoes
* Artwork: ''Orc from the armies of the Great Eye''
** By: Lynda Channon
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Letters
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* Small Press
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Debi's Dabblings
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Tolk Folk
* Artwork: Denethor
** By: Tom Sherry
* Mathom
** By: Gwyneth Morgan
* Notices
* Additional Calligraphy and Artwork
** By: Kirsty Beck, Susanne Stopfel, Simon Jacobs, Geraint Rees, Bryan Glenet, Maggie Percival, Steve Lines, Ruth Lacon, Howard J. Bates & Walter Clarke
